actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide temporary import surcharges to compensate for the disproportionate cost to the United States of America of the Persian Gulf War of 1991.
short_title: Persian Gulf War Burden Sharing Act of 1991

summary.text: Persian Gulf War Burden Sharing Act of 1991 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to require the President to impose a temporary import surcharge on articles imported from countries that have not contributed to the Persian Gulf War in proportion to the U.S. contribution.

titles.title: Persian Gulf War Burden Sharing Act of 1991
To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide temporary import surcharges to compensate for the disproportionate cost to the United States of America of the Persian Gulf War of 1991.
